import React, { useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import { Table,Checkbox } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const RequestLog=() =>{ const reqInfo={ reqNO:"", cAddress:"", description:"", amount:"", recipient:"", donors:"", voters:"" } const[Requests,setReq]=useState([reqInfo]) return (

REQUEST CREATION

setDes(e.target.value)}>
setAmount(e.target.value)}>
setRecp(e.target.value)}>

Name Registration Date E-mail address Premium Plan
); } export default RequestLog
